channel.title: Memo on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Memo on Dash

item.title: Things To Be Done From Jan21 To Jan25
item.description: Things to be done in this week: 1. Installation documentation for OpenStack, but don’t try it myself. 2. Documentation on Contrail. 3. Conceptions on SDN(Software Defined Networking). 4. Books on SDN/PLATFORMs. 5. Enable the CoreOS Access via SurfacePro. 6. Guangzhou Weather/PM2.5/PM10. 7. To enable the key-map on MAC? 8. Build awesome on CentOS, and let it to be my default WM. If there are more things to be added, type it following.
